name: get_player_info_tool
description: Fetch basic player information (name, team, position, height, weight, age, IDs). Use for player lookups, identification, and basic bio data. Aliases: player bio, who is, player details.

player_names.description: List of player names (partial matches supported, case-insensitive)

name: get_player_profile
description: Fetch comprehensive player profile combining basic info and all available stats in a single call. Reduces need for 3-4 separate tool calls. Returns playerInfo, receivingStats, passingStats, rushingStats.

player_names.description: List of player names (partial matches supported)

name: compare_players
description: Compare 2-5 players side-by-side with stats, dynasty rankings, consistency metrics, and cross-position commonMetrics. Supports scoring_format parameter (ppr/half_ppr/standard). Use for trade evaluation, start/sit, draft decisions, flex comparison. Aliases: player comparison, head to head, versus, matchup, side by side.

player_names.description: List of 2-5 player names to compare

summary.description: If true, returns compact output with key metrics only

scoring_format.description: Scoring format for fantasy points (default ppr)

name: get_trade_context
description: Fetch all data needed for a fantasy trade evaluation in a single composite call. Replaces 5-6 sequential tool calls. Returns player info, season stats with fantasy points (PPR and standard), dynasty rankings, consistency metrics, and optional league context for both give and receive sides. Aliases: evaluate trade, trade analysis, sell high, buy low, dynasty trade, trade value.

league_id.description: Sleeper league ID for league context

include_weekly.description: Include recent weekly data for trend analysis

recent_weeks.description: Number of recent weeks to include (default 4)

name: get_advanced_receiving_stats
description: Fetch advanced seasonal receiving analytics for WR/TE/RB. Includes volume metrics (targets, receptions, yards, TDs, fantasy points), efficiency metrics (target_share, catch_percentage, avg_yac, RACR, EPA), and percentile ranks (targets_pctile, fantasy_points_ppr_pctile). Aliases: receiving stats, target share, catch rate, WR stats, TE stats.

positions.description: Filter by positions (default WR, TE, RB)

name: get_advanced_passing_stats
description: Fetch advanced seasonal passing analytics for QB. Includes volume metrics (passing yards, TDs, sacks, pressures), efficiency metrics (passer_rating, completion_percentage, EPA, QBR, avg_time_to_throw), and percentile ranks. Aliases: passing stats, QB stats, quarterback analysis.

name: get_advanced_rushing_stats
description: Fetch advanced seasonal rushing analytics for RB/QB. Includes carries, yards, TDs, rushing EPA, efficiency, expected rush yards, avg_rush_yards, and percentile ranks. Aliases: rushing stats, RB stats, carry share, ground game.

name: get_advanced_defense_stats
description: Fetch advanced seasonal defensive analytics. Includes sacks, INTs, tackles, pressures, completion percentage allowed, and percentile ranks. Aliases: defense stats, IDP stats, defensive player.

positions.description: Positions (default CB, DB, DE, DL, LB, S)

name: get_player_consistency
description: Fetch player consistency metrics: avg fantasy points, std deviation, floor (p10), ceiling (p90), boom/bust game counts, consistency coefficient. Use for assessing week-to-week reliability, lineup risk, and floor/ceiling profiles. Aliases: boom bust, floor ceiling, consistent, volatile, reliable.

name: get_fantasy_ranks
description: Fetch dynasty rankings from vw_dynasty_ranks. Includes ECR, positional rank, tier, value. Use for dynasty value assessment, trade evaluation baseline, ranking comparison. Aliases: dynasty rankings, dynasty value, trade value, player rankings, rank, ECR.

position.description: Filter by position (QB, RB, WR, TE)

name: get_fantasy_rank_page_types
description: Get distinct dynasty rank page types (e.g. dynasty-overall, dynasty-qb, superflex-rankings). Call this first to discover available ranking categories.

name: get_sleeper_trending_players
description: Get trending player adds/drops from Sleeper over a time window. Shows which players are being added or dropped league-wide. Use for waiver wire recommendations, breakout detection, injury replacement targets. Aliases: trending, waiver wire, who should I grab, pickup, hot adds, most added.

name: get_sleeper_league_rosters
description: Get rosters for a Sleeper league. With summary=True, returns player names/positions/teams. Use for roster analysis, trade targets, positional needs assessment. Aliases: league rosters, my team, my roster, roster construction.

summary.description: If true, returns human-readable roster data

name: get_sleeper_league_matchups
description: Get matchups for a Sleeper league and week. With summary=True, returns player names and lineup details. Use for weekly matchup analysis, start/sit context. Aliases: matchups, this week, weekly matchup, opponent.

summary.description: If true, returns human-readable matchup data

name: get_sleeper_league_by_id
description: Get Sleeper league details by ID. With summary=False, includes scoring_settings, roster_positions. Use for understanding league format, scoring rules. Aliases: league info, league settings, scoring format.

summary.description: If true, compact info without nested settings

name: get_sleeper_league_transactions
description: Get transactions for a Sleeper league and week. Filter by trade, waiver, free_agent. Use for trade history, recent activity. Aliases: trades, transactions, recent moves.

name: get_metrics_metadata
description: Returns metric definitions by category (receiving, passing, rushing, defense). Use before querying stats to understand available metrics.

name: search_web_tool
description: Search the web for current NFL news, injury reports, fantasy analysis, and breaking stories. Use for real-time info not in the database. Aliases: news, injury update, latest, breaking.
